title: ENCORE: Back to Bennifer | The Boy With The Dragon Tattoo | 2
description:
After dragging himself back from a bad breakup and a dismal career slump, Ben finds love again with someone else. But for all his achievements, he can't seem to shake the specter of his father. Forgiving his dad will mean forgiving himself first — and maybe even finding love again.
